0: Brandenburg Gate 80 m and Reichstag a further 150 m
Only issue is wifi should be gratis in rooms
It is somewhat run down and the staff is generally uncaring about quality as the hotel is booked because of location
by loo that would not stop running after being flushed noisy and would not flush again but staff really tried to fix it rather stubborn and compensated us well for the problem
but I still expected more from staff offer to sit somewhere or at least drink of water

The free TV channels are also pathetic either in German or Arabic a lot of the English american movies and series are dubbed with the English channels being mainly for news and plus because they want to make money from even this you can not even change the dubbed language to the original bah
Room is opulent but in decay
Room lights operated by a touch screen that never worked without fiddling with it for almost a minutes
the staff explained the hotel was overboked and they would have to go to the Mariot next door
1: That was my second stay at the Ritz Carlton Berlin this year and I just can not wait for the next one
The service is good they are trying to help with all details and can be effective
In the end this other masseuse took care of me
This incident aside the overall quality of service far exceeds any inconvenience we may have had
The room was great although the view was ordinary
Before you leave make sure you meet Robert the real life Beefeater who is the voice of the Berlin Bear
The Beefeater greets you every day with a smile on his face
Happy to answer any questions on this or the city experience
They sadly treated us unbelievable rude
2: On check out the same bellman who we met when we arrived was very helpful in storing our bags and then getting us a cab to the airport
Nice rooms great service great location
Great spot near city center and Berlins landmarks
I come every year for Christmas
Of course if you like the grand style you will find plenty to enjoy such as the magnificent staircase leading up from the lobby or the lovely old fashioned yet high tech elevator armaments
Considering we were with a group of 360 people it was amazing
A must stay for special occasions
Service is very good and the overall experience was great
Great beds and everything is available
